Text:
***WARNING: THIS IS WATERMARKED every 10-15min for about 30secs with bright pink letters saying "Encoded by VYTO", then some other shit, etc--repeated throughout the movie. 

VYTO: you are assholes.

There are no watermarks. This noob michaelrwatson doesn't know the difference between a Watermark and Subtitle.  Encoded by VYTO, is from the subtitle, only comes at the end. Poor fella got crazy, coz he got banged up from behind :P
